skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns. 

If the target is under a [Hex] debuff, each hit also has a 40% chance of applying a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 1 random debuff from the target and placing it on all enemies.
skills.name: Noxious Claws
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 60% chance of increasing the duration of any [Hex] debuffs on enemies by 1 turn. 

If enemies are not under a [Hex] debuff, each hit has a 60% chance of placing a [Hex] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Immortal Malison
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Has an 80% chance of inflicting damage from one [Poison] debuff to enemies under a [Hex] debuff whenever their allies receive damage from [Poison] debuffs.
skills.name: Hex Blood [P]
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
